tweets.text: looks like the server is offline! dont worry, this is pretty normal i think

replies.text: you can come back in a little bit and it should be working again, then you can post your tweet :)
im hosting this myself so i cant really guarantee 24/7 uptime, but if i were to guess itll be more like 23/6 uptime, which is still pretty good!
theres a few scenarios where ill have to intervene manually (SSL expired, IP changed, my code bad, ...) but usually it should come back online pretty quick
if its taking too long, dont hesitate to send me a message and ill fix it right away!

limit.text: youve been rate limited :( the previous tweet has only just been posted and it wouldnt be fair to get rid of it so fast, they all deserve a chance to shine!

replies.text: youll just have to wait a few minutes and then a new tweet can be posted again, thats not so bad now is it
a new tweet can be posted every 3 minutes, i think thats fair im not really sure so ill just better be safe than sorry
if its too long i can get it down to about a minute before running into the twitter api rate limits so theres some room still
oh and sorry you have to type it all again i hope it wasnt too long of a tweet, but on the other hand, what are you doing posting long tweets on here anyways?

tweets.text: these arent real tweets! i made a little copy of the twitter ui so most things dont actually do anything at all, but feel free to click around!

replies.text: the only button that does something important is when you post a tweet, it will delete the previous tweet and then post your tweet on my account, fully anonymous and (almost) exactly as if i tweeted it myself
theres just a few limitations for tweets posted from here:
there can only be one tweet, the previous tweet will always be deleted and yours will be the only one left, until it is to meet the same fate
all mentions and links will be escaped and wont show nice and blue, that would give you a little bit too much power i think
the tweet source (usually the Twitter for Android/iPhone thing) will show the tweet being posted from here instead
theres a little list of words i believe could get me suspended (or that you just shouldnt say at all) and i will censor those
i probably missed a lot of them but im hoping everybody just behaves!
and obviously, anything the ui wont allow, attachments, replies, quote tweets, ... you also cant do
i only store data necessary for the app to work, which is the id and time of the last posted tweet, a cache of the last get request response and a log of any errors
when your tweet gets deleted its gone for good!

tweets.text: i wont be reading any tweets posted from here, this is meant for you!

replies.text: go crazy! post something wild! its like curiouscat but nobody will answer!
now that i think about it that doesnt actually sound very appealing but ive already made the whole thing so we will all just have to live with it
and the 140 something followers who probably dont even know who i am (and will likely start unfollowing once i start to pop up on their timeline)
why and how do i even have this many followers anyways its insane its just way too many

tweets.text: you can change display settings using the header at the top, the bird cycles between accent colors and the stars cycle between light and dark themes, the avatar switches between android and ios

replies.text: i tried to stay as close to the app versions as i could but most of it is just an approximation and i didnt implement all aspects because im literally just using html/css/js cut me a little bit of slack please
ive already got the twitter for web app completely beat so if we use that as a baseline i think i did pretty well
android stuff i didnt implement

the circle ripple click effect for the compose tweet button, its not terribly hard to make but it requires quite a bit of js for something so small and doesnt look good when only using html/css to approximate it

the header sliding away when youre going down the timeline, i dont think this is possible using only html/css and i could do it with js but that just sounds like a bitch to write and its not even that good of an effect to begin with, also my display settings are there!
ios stuff i didnt implement
same as for android i didnt implement the header sliding away, although ios just does it in like, a way worse way? its terribly inconsistent for some reason i have no clue whats going on with that

that ugly ass tiny spinner, why is it so small? and why does it look so old? i could make it but itd be an offense to the android spinner to replace it with that thing and i cant bring myself to do that
that crazy ass scrolling effect holy shit it goes so far! who even wants that? its just ridiculous also this would be a complete bitch to make god damn hell no im not doing that

the horizontal screen animations keeping the header steady and fading it to the next state instead, this would be way too much work to do for something so small itd require a whole different and way more complicated approach to screen animations which wouldnt even be used for android

the way numbers are shown is actually different (dates as well but i did that), they swap the usage of . and , to seperate the number (eg 1.234 and 12,3K), this isnt hard to make but itd require me to reload the whole homepage when changing systems and both of these things are stupid and ios is just doing it wrong so i wont do that (and the web app does it in a third way! the date too! why! just pick one!)
other stuff i didnt implement
any ui elements that will never really show up, which is quite a lot, but i did do most of the main ones so its fair i think
the most important things im missing would be attachments, quote tweets, little messages such as pinned or retweeted by and embedded links, mentions, emojis, ...

the scroll position being remembered when going back to a previous page, i could probably do it using the link data param but that would have me listening to all scroll events and updating the link info each time and it just seems so annoying to make with proper code i cant be bothered

theres a lot of weird quirks, like android wont show the replying to field only if a tweet is the second reply in a reply chain, or ios will hide the bottom tweet borders when viewing a tweet that has no replies, or sometimes the show this thread prompt shows up with an avatar next to it and sometimes without and i didnt bother doing any of that because all of it is ridiculous
the web version for pc, that would be a straight nightmare its so horribly inconsistent with the apps
almost all features that wouldnt serve an actual purpose, because theres still a limit to both my free time and devotion to a project this stupid
i havent actually gotten any questions because this hasnt even been released yet, so ill just put questions i think make sense below
this is fucking stupid why would anybody use this
